data.name: Proto-G Demo
data.detailed_description:
Proto-G is a single player hack and slash classics that shows a conflict of two human involving good vs violent robots. Takes place in Mercurium City, a future city on earth where robots and AI has become so advanced and an integral part of human life. Proto-G is a code name project for ADAM. He was a genesis project that was left abandoned by his creator for its an illegal robots to build at that time.

One day conflict arise, and Mercurium City is under attack by unidentified units of robots. ADAM is the only one who posses such military might to repel the assault and so he was awoken by his creator. So begin ADAM mission to fight the oppositions along the city's road and saving citizens.

In this game, you will play as ADAM and fight hard bosses in order to reveal the final culprit behind all of this terror happening to their peaceful life. Discover more about ADAM learning capability as he progress on his mission and save the day!

Try out our Demo, your feedbacks matter to us.
data.about_the_game:

Takes place in Mercurium City, a future city on earth where robots and AI has become so advanced and an integral part of human life. Proto-G is a code name project for ADAM. He was a genesis project that was left abandoned by his creator for its an illegal robots to build at that time.

Try out our Demo, your feedbacks matter to us.
data.short_description: A sudden assault by unknown violent robots against peaceful Mercurium City has brought ADAM as part of Proto-G project to re-alive once more. He must fight countless dangerous foes trying to kill people and save the entire city. Embrace yourself as you uncover the evil ultimate enemy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is still an ongoing demo project. Disk space might changed in the future.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.9 Ghz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
